alert.note: Alert for Monroe Middle Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 07 at 11:17PM EDT until October 08 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Middle Florida Keys. * WHEN...Through Sunday afternoon, especially during times of high tide. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is likely. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
